subject: Add input check schema in task api

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Patch Set 1:

I noticed jenkins failed, I think you hit bug(s):

- gate-glance-python27: unrecognized error
- gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full: https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/1403291

Some of the tests failed in a way that we did not understand. Please help us classify these issues so that they can be part of Elastic Recheck http://status.openstack.org/elastic-recheck/
For more details on this and other bugs, please see http://status.openstack.org/elastic-recheck/

Patch Set 5: Code-Review-1

I think this may require a spec so we can decide the best way to implement this.


(1) The 'input' element is supposed to be deployer-specific, so the 'task_input' schema used would have to be configurable.  As you mention, it's also likely to be different for different tasks, so that's another thing to consider.

(2) There's a lot of repetition between your input_task schema and the image schema.  Maybe a better approach is to use the image schema to validate the image properties that are submitted?

Patch Set 5: Workflow-1

Thanks Brian. As I know, Liberty's features were freezed. This could be discussed in M.  I agree with your idea. Your suggestion looks reasonable. And I also forgot the influence to Schema Api. We should stop this patch until reach an agreement.

Patch Set 5:

Great, there will be some time devoted to tasks at the Glance sessions at the design summit in Tokyo.  This is an important topic, I'm glad you brought it up.

Patch Set 5:

@Brian, I'm sorry that i can't attend Tokyo summit for working reason. I wish you can bring the idea up and share with us. I'll follow though internet.

Patch Set 5:

I'll make sure it's discussed.  You may have noticed that there's some current discussion on the dev mailing list related to tasks:

http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2015-September/074360.html

http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2015-September/074383.html
